verses.verse: וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> And when the people כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בֹשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H954><s%> delayed מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> that Moses לָרֶ֣דֶת <S%H3381><s%> to come down מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָהָ֑ר <S%H2022><s%> out of the mount וַיִּקָּהֵ֨ל <S%H6950><s%> gathered themselves together הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> the people עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> about אַהֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> unto Aaron וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> to him ק֣וּם ׀ <S%H6965><s%> unto him Up עֲשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> make לָ֣נוּ אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> us gods אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who יֵֽלְכוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> will go לְפָנֵ֔ינוּ <S%H6440><s%> before כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for זֶ֣ה ׀ <S%H2088><s%> this מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> us for [as for] this Moses הָאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the man אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who הֶֽעֱלָ֙נוּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> that brought מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> us up out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יָדַ֖עְנוּ <S%H3045><s%> we wot מֶה־ <S%H4100><s%> what הָ֥יָה <S%H1961><s%> has become לֽוֹ׃

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> about אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> And Aaron פָּֽרְקוּ֙ <S%H6561><s%> unto them Break off נִזְמֵ֣י <S%H5141><s%> earrings הַזָּהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> the golden אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <S%H241><s%> which [are] in the ears נְשֵׁיכֶ֔ם <S%H802><s%> of your wives בְּנֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1121><s%> of your sons וּבְנֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1323><s%> and of your daughters וְהָבִ֖יאוּ <S%H935><s%> and bring אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַיִּתְפָּֽרְקוּ֙ <S%H6561><s%> brake off כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> And all the people אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נִזְמֵ֥י <S%H5141><s%> earrings הַזָּהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> the golden אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּאָזְנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H241><s%> which [were] in their ears וַיָּבִ֖יאוּ <S%H935><s%> and brought אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַהֲרֹֽן׃ <S%H175><s%> [them] unto Aaron

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> And he received מִיָּדָ֗ם <S%H3027><s%> [them] at their hand וַיָּ֤צַר <S%H3335><s%> earthen אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> בַּחֶ֔רֶט <S%H2747><s%> it with a graving tool וַֽיַּעֲשֵׂ֖הוּ <S%H6213><s%> after he had made עֵ֣גֶל <S%H5695><s%> calf מַסֵּכָ֑ה <S%H4541><s%> it a molten וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> and they said אֵ֤לֶּה <S%H428><s%> This אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> These [be] thy gods יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> O Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who הֶעֱל֖וּךָ <S%H5927><s%> which brought מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> thee up out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> And when Aaron וַיִּ֥בֶן <S%H1129><s%> [it] he built מִזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> an altar לְפָנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> before וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> made proclamation אַֽהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> it and Aaron וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> and said חַ֥ג <S%H2282><s%> [is] a feast לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD מָחָֽר׃ <S%H4279><s%> To morrow

וַיַּשְׁכִּ֙ימוּ֙ <S%H7925><s%> And they rose up early מִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <S%H4283><s%> on the morrow וַיַּעֲל֣וּ <S%H5927><s%> and offered עֹלֹ֔ת <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings וַיַּגִּ֖שׁוּ <S%H5066><s%> and brought שְׁלָמִ֑ים <S%H8002><s%> peace offerings וַיֵּ֤שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> sat הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> and the people לֶֽאֱכֹ֣ל <S%H398><s%> down to eat וְשָׁת֔וֹ <S%H8354><s%> and to drink וַיָּקֻ֖מוּ <S%H6965><s%> and rose up לְצַחֵֽק׃ <S%H6711><s%> to play פ

וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֶךְ־ <S%H1980><s%> Go רֵ֕ד <S%H3381><s%> get thee down כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for שִׁחֵ֣ת <S%H7843><s%> have corrupted עַמְּךָ֔ <S%H5971><s%> for thy people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom הֶעֱלֵ֖יתָ <S%H5927><s%> which thou broughtest מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

סָ֣רוּ <S%H5493><s%> They have turned מַהֵ֗ר <S%H4118><s%> aside quickly מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> out of the way אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוִּיתִ֔ם <S%H6680><s%> which I commanded עָשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> them they have made לָהֶ֔ם עֵ֖גֶל <S%H5695><s%> calf מַסֵּכָ֑ה <S%H4541><s%> them a molten וַיִּשְׁתַּֽחֲווּ־ <S%H7812><s%> and have worshipped לוֹ֙ וַיִּזְבְּחוּ־ <S%H2076><s%> it and have sacrificed ל֔וֹ וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> thereunto and said אֵ֤לֶּה <S%H428><s%> This אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> These [be] thy gods יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> O Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who הֶֽעֱל֖וּךָ <S%H5927><s%> which have brought thee up מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> I have seen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> this people הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people קְשֵׁה־ <S%H7186><s%> churlish עֹ֖רֶף <S%H6203><s%> stiff-necked הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> Now הַנִּ֣יחָה <S%H3240><s%> Now therefore let me alone לִּ֔י וְיִֽחַר־ <S%H2734><s%> may wax hot אַפִּ֥י <S%H639><s%> that my wrath בָהֶ֖ם וַאֲכַלֵּ֑ם <S%H3615><s%> against them and that I may consume וְאֶֽעֱשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> them and I will make אוֹתְךָ֖ <S%H853><s%> לְג֥וֹי <S%H1471><s%> nation גָּדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> of thee a great

וַיְחַ֣ל <S%H2470><s%> entreated מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> accept יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑יו <S%H430><s%> his God וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said לָמָ֤ה <S%H4100><s%> why יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> LORD יֶחֱרֶ֤ה <S%H2734><s%> wax hot אַפְּךָ֙ <S%H639><s%> why doth thy wrath בְּעַמֶּ֔ךָ <S%H5971><s%> against thy people אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> whom הוֹצֵ֙אתָ֙ <S%H3318><s%> which thou hast brought forth מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt בְּכֹ֥חַ <S%H3581><s%> power גָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> with great וּבְיָ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> and with חֲזָקָֽה׃ <S%H2389><s%> and with a mighty

לָמָּה֩ <S%H4100><s%> Why יֹאמְר֨וּ <S%H559><s%> speak מִצְרַ֜יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> and say בְּרָעָ֤ה <S%H7451><s%> For mischief הֽוֹצִיאָם֙ <S%H3318><s%> did he bring לַהֲרֹ֤ג <S%H2026><s%> them out to slay אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> בֶּֽהָרִ֔ים <S%H2022><s%> them in the mountains וּ֨לְכַלֹּתָ֔ם <S%H3615><s%> and to consume מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> about פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> them from the face הָֽאֲדָמָ֑ה <S%H127><s%> land שׁ֚וּב <S%H7725><s%> break מֵחֲר֣וֹן <S%H2740><s%> from thy fierce אַפֶּ֔ךָ <S%H639><s%> wrath וְהִנָּחֵ֥ם <S%H5162><s%> and repent עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> about הָרָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> of this evil לְעַמֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5971><s%> against thy people

זְכֹ֡ר <S%H2142><s%> Remember לְאַבְרָהָם֩ <S%H85><s%> Abraham לְיִצְחָ֨ק <S%H3327><s%> Isaac וּלְיִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> and Israel עֲבָדֶ֗יךָ <S%H5650><s%> thy servants אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> to whom נִשְׁבַּ֣עְתָּ <S%H7650><s%> to whom thou swarest לָהֶם֮ בָּךְ֒ וַתְּדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> by thine own self and saidst אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to אַרְבֶּה֙ <S%H7235><s%> unto them I will multiply אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> זַרְעֲכֶ֔ם <S%H2233><s%> your seed כְּכוֹכְבֵ֖י <S%H3556><s%> as the stars הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָאָ֨רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and all this land הַזֹּ֜את <S%H2063><s%> likewise אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> of which אָמַ֗רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> that I have spoken אֶתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> of will I give לְזַרְעֲכֶ֔ם <S%H2233><s%> unto your seed וְנָחֲל֖וּ <S%H5157><s%> and they shall inherit לְעֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> [it] for ever

וַיִּנָּ֖חֶם <S%H5162><s%> repented יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> about הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> of the evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> which he thought לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do לְעַמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5971><s%> unto his people פ

וַיִּ֜פֶן <S%H6437><s%> turned וַיֵּ֤רֶד <S%H3381><s%> and went down מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> And Moses מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָהָ֔ר <S%H2022><s%> from the mount וּשְׁנֵ֛י <S%H8147><s%> and the two לֻחֹ֥ת <S%H3871><s%> tables הָעֵדֻ֖ת <S%H5715><s%> of the testimony בְּיָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> [were] in his hand לֻחֹ֗ת <S%H3871><s%> the tables כְּתֻבִים֙ <S%H3789><s%> [were] written מִשְּׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> on both עֶבְרֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5676><s%> their sides מִזֶּ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> one וּמִזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> and the other הֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> they כְּתֻבִֽים׃ <S%H3789><s%> on the one side and on the other [were] they written

וְהַ֨לֻּחֹ֔ת <S%H3871><s%> And the tables מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> [were] the work אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God הֵ֑מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like וְהַמִּכְתָּ֗ב <S%H4385><s%> and the writing מִכְתַּ֤ב <S%H4385><s%> [was] the writing אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> of God ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he חָר֖וּת <S%H2801><s%> graven עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַלֻּחֹֽת׃ <S%H3871><s%> upon the tables

וַיִּשְׁמַ֧ע <S%H8085><s%> heard יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <S%H3091><s%> And when Joshua אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the noise הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people בְּרֵעֹ֑ה <S%H7452><s%> as they shouted וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> he said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> [There is] a noise מִלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> of war בַּֽמַּחֲנֶה׃ <S%H4264><s%> in the camp

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> Nor קוֹל֙ <S%H6963><s%> [It is] not the voice עֲנ֣וֹת <S%H6030><s%> of [them that] shout גְּבוּרָ֔ה <S%H1369><s%> for mastery וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> Nor ק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> neither [is it] the voice עֲנ֣וֹת <S%H6030><s%> of [them that] cry חֲלוּשָׁ֑ה <S%H2476><s%> for being overcome ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> [but] the noise עַנּ֔וֹת <S%H6030><s%> testify אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I שֹׁמֵֽעַ׃ <S%H8085><s%> do I hear

וַֽיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> as קָרַב֙ <S%H7126><s%> And it came to pass as soon as he came nigh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> unto the camp וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> that he saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֵ֖גֶל <S%H5695><s%> the calf וּמְחֹלֹ֑ת <S%H4246><s%> and the dancing וַיִּֽחַר־ <S%H2734><s%> waxed hot אַ֣ף <S%H639><s%> anger מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> and Moses' וַיַּשְׁלֵ֤ךְ <S%H7993><s%> and he cast [מִיָּדֹו כ] (מִיָּדָיו֙ <S%H3027><s%> able ק) אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַלֻּחֹ֔ת <S%H3871><s%> the tables וַיְשַׁבֵּ֥ר <S%H7665><s%> and brake אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> them beneath הָהָֽר׃ <S%H2022><s%> the mount

וַיִּקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> And he took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֵ֨גֶל <S%H5695><s%> the calf אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשׂוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> which they had made וַיִּשְׂרֹ֣ף <S%H8313><s%> and burnt בָּאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> [it] in the fire וַיִּטְחַ֖ן <S%H2912><s%> and ground עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which דָּ֑ק <S%H1854><s%> [it] to powder וַיִּ֙זֶר֙ <S%H2219><s%> and strawed עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> [it] upon הַמַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> the water וַיַּ֖שְׁקְ <S%H8248><s%> drink אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> and made the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel
